column4: why do i get this msg? #freenode Please register with services and use the IDENTIFY command (/msg nickserv help) to speak in this channel,   in #freenode, also i get that error msg and not able to conversate..
do you see tab named nickserv if you do type /msg username password and hit enter
where do i need to type /msg?
I use Opera too disconnect from irc and connect again you will see nickserv tab and there type /msg username password
